sentences.sentence: Many smoothies have more than just fruit. Some have ice cream or yogurt.
sentences.translation: 很多奶昔不仅只有水果，有些有冰淇淋或酸奶。

sentences.sentence: You're really better off making your own smoothies at home with your own fresh fruit and low fat yogurt.
sentences.translation: 你最好在家自己做奶昔，用你自己的新鲜水果和低脂酸奶。
